mapper.select: select pro.p_no, pro.m_no, pro.p_c_no, pro.price, pro.p_content, date_format(pro.p_reg_date, "%Y.%c.%e %H:%i") p_reg_date,pro.deal_step, pro.deal_type, pro.quality, pro.deal_opt, pro.p_addr, pro.p_lat, pro.p_lon, cate.p_keyword, pho.p_ph_path, pho.p_ph_name from product pro, pro_categorie cate, pro_photo pho where m_no = #{mNo} and pro.p_c_no = cate.p_c_no and pho.p_no = pro.p_no and pro.deal_type = #{dealType} order by pro.p_no desc limit #{start}, 6

select p_c_no, p_no, cmt.m_no, p_c_content, date_format(p_c_reg_date, "%Y. %c. %e %H:%i") p_c_reg_date, mem.m_photo, mem.id, mem.nname from pro_comment cmt, member mem where p_no = #{pNo} and cmt.m_no = mem.m_no order by p_c_no desc limit #{start}, 8
mapper.insert: insert into pro_comment (p_no, m_no, p_c_content, p_c_reg_date) values (#{pNo}, #{mNo}, #{pcContent}, now())
mapper.select: select pro.p_no, pro.p_c_no, pro.price, pro.p_content, pro.deal_opt, pro.quality, pro.p_addr, pro.deal_type, date_format(pro.p_reg_date, "%Y년 %c월 %e일 %H:%i") p_reg_date, cate.p_keyword, cate.p_high_cate, cate.p_low_cate, mem.id, mem.nname, mem.m_photo, mem.like_cnt, mem.m_no, date_format(mem.join_date, "%Y. %e %b") join_date, (select count(*) from product where m_no = mem.m_no) product_cnt, (select count(*) from pro_comment where p_no = pro.p_no) comment_cnt from product pro, pro_categorie cate, member mem where pro.p_c_no = cate.p_c_no and pro.m_no = mem.m_no and pro.p_no = #{pNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into pro_categorie (p_keyword, p_high_cate, p_low_cate) values (#{pKeyword}, #{pHighCate}, #{pLowCate})
select last_insert_id()

insert into product (m_no, p_c_no, price, p_content, p_reg_date, deal_type, quality, deal_opt, p_addr, p_lat, p_lon) values (#{mNo}, #{pCategorieNo}, #{price}, #{pContent}, now(), #{dealType}, #{quality}, #{dealOpt}, #{pAddr}, #{pLat}, #{pLon})
select last_insert_id()
insert into pro_photo (p_no, p_ph_path, p_ph_thum, p_ph_name) values (#{pNo}, #{pPhotoPath}, #{pPhotoThum}, #{pPhotoName})
mapper.select: select p_high_cate, count(*) volume from product pro, pro_categorie cate where cate.p_c_no = pro.p_c_no group by cate.p_high_cate order by cate.p_high_cate asc

select max(p_no) p_no, p_high_cate, p_ph_path, p_ph_name from ( select pro.p_no, cate.p_high_cate, ph.p_ph_path, ph.p_ph_name from pro_photo ph, product pro, pro_categorie cate where cate.p_c_no = pro.p_c_no and pro.p_no = ph.p_no and ph.p_ph_thum='y' and pro.deal_type = 's' and pro.deal_step='y' ) productall group by p_high_cate order by p_high_cate asc
